Case Study - Apple Inc. FY-2024
-----------------------------------
To demonstrate the practical output of the extraction pipeline, we present a sample case using Apple Inc.’s FY-2024 Corporate Sustainability Report. Three representative indicators were selected for comparison between extracted values and CSR-stated figures.

.. raw:: html

    <table border="1" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
    <thead>
        <tr><th>Indicator</th><th>Extracted</th><th>CSR Stated</th><th>Δ</th></tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr><td>Scope 1 Emissions (tCO₂e)</td><td>55,200</td><td>55,200</td><td>0%</td></tr>
        <tr><td>Renewable Electricity Share (%)</td><td>100</td><td>100</td><td>0%</td></tr>
        <tr><td>Net-Zero Target Year</td><td>2030</td><td>2030</td><td>0%</td></tr>
    </tbody>
    </table>

Table 12: Indicators of Apple Inc. Comparison
The results demonstrate perfect agreement across all fields, confirming the pipeline’s ability to extract and normalize ESG indicators with high fidelity. The output was verified against the ground truth disclosed in the original PDF, validating both the technical correctness and business relevance of the extracted dataset.
